alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 04 at 12:42PM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical fire weather conditions expected across portions of the area on Sunday, mainly south of Interstate 70. Portions of the Fire Weather Watch have been upgraded to a Red Flag Warning ... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 013 AND 029... * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman and Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...Around 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start may have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
